Class RegTestFundingSource

    • com.msgilligan.bitcoinj.test.RegTestFundingSource

    FundingSource
    public class RegTestFundingSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements FundingSource
    FundingSource using RegTest mining, BitcoinExtendedClient (with getRegTestMiningAddress), and the server's default wallet for accumulating coins.
